    SelectElemVisitor
    // https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms176104.aspx select_list : select_list_elem (',' select_list_elem)* ; select_list_elem : asterisk | column_elem // TODO to be understood // | udt_elem // Modified // | expression_elem | expression as_column_alias? ; as_column_alias : AS? column_alias ; column_elem // : (table_name '.')?
